@missing.Link You are so wrong....this isn't a movie just for women that have been raped. It's for people that love movies about revenge and horror movies. The sweet revenge plot  satisfied me in the same way as Kill Bill and Deathproof. The scenes were great, it's not just your typical torcher and kill horror. The methods of killing and torcher were extremely creative. Of course it is a bit silly that a boney 100lb. woman came out of nowhere, relatively unscathed after nearly being raped to death and managed to knock out, torcher and kill four fully grown men, but hey thats movies.

What happened to the sheriffs daughter was left unresolved which I thought was annoying also. The graphic violence was well done.
